text: Ko'i eva vyaktine jene allaha ta'ala kitaba, hikamata ane payagambari ape, to pana sakya nathi ke te lokone kahe ke tame allaha ta'alane chodine mara banda'o bani ja'o, parantu te to kahese ke tame sau palanaharana bani ja'o, tamara kitaba sikhavadavana karane ane tamara kitaba padhavana karane
